code:
---
config:
  theme: default
title: Sockets Client - Execution Flow
---

sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    actor User
    participant Main as SocketsClient
    
    box rgb(Infra_EtcdCluster) Middleware Layer
        participant ClientAdapter as TCPClientAdapter
        participant Network
    end
    
    box rgb(Infra_WorkerNode) App Layer - Application
        participant UseCase as SendFileUseCase
    end
    
    box rgb(Infra_RedisCache) App Layer - Infrastructure
        participant Repo as ConsoleFileRepository
    end
    
    participant Console
    
    box rgb(Infra_WorkerNode) Server Side
        participant Server
    end

    User->>Main: Start client application
    Main->>Repo: new ConsoleFileRepository(Infra_IngressController)
    Main->>UseCase: new SendFileUseCase(Infra_RedisCache)
    Main->>ClientAdapter: new TCPClientAdapter(Infra_IngressController)
    Main->>ClientAdapter: start(Infra_LoadBalancer)

    ClientAdapter->>Console: Print "Connecting to localhost:1234"
    ClientAdapter->>Network: new Socket(Infra_EtcdCluster)
    Network-->>ClientAdapter: Return connected socket
    ClientAdapter->>Console: Print "Connected to server"

    ClientAdapter->>UseCase: execute(Infra_IngressController)
    UseCase->>Repo: getFileFromSrc(Infra_EtcdCluster)
    Repo->>Console: Print "Enter content for 'message': "
    Console->>User: Display prompt
    User->>Console: Type message and press Enter
    Console-->>Repo: Return input string
    Repo->>Repo: Create File entity
    Repo-->>UseCase: Return File
    UseCase->>UseCase: Extract content
    UseCase-->>ClientAdapter: Return content string

    ClientAdapter->>Network: write(Infra_EtcdCluster)
    ClientAdapter->>Network: newLine(Infra_IngressController)
    ClientAdapter->>Network: flush(Infra_WorkerNode)
    Network->>Server: Send data packet
    ClientAdapter->>Console: Print "Sent: [Infra_EtcdCluster]"

    ClientAdapter->>Network: Close socket
    ClientAdapter->>Console: Print "Connection closed"
    ClientAdapter-->>Main: Return
    Main-->>User: Exit application
